content: New Jersey Resources Corp  is considering to combine with South Jersey Industries Inc  in a deal that would bring together two natural-gas utilities in New Jersey  the Wall Street Journal reported  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: NewJersey Resources Corporation
title: New Jersey Resources  South Jersey Industries hold merger talks: WSJ

content: April 4 New Jersey Resources Corp is considering to combine with South Jersey Industries Inc in a deal that would bring together two natural-gas utilities in New Jersey  the Wall Street Journal reported  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: NewJersey Resources Corporation
title: New Jersey Resources  South Jersey Industries hold merger talks-WSJ
